quotes.quote: You've got to stay strong to be strong in tough times.
A Tough life with God is better than a good life without Him.
When the going gets tough, the tough take a nap.
To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
Tough times never last, but tough people do.
Life is as easy or as hard as you think it is.
Life is tough so get tougher.
It's a tough life if you don't weaken.
The soul is renewed through tough times.
You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
Life is tough; and if you have the ability to laugh at it, you have the ability to enjoy it.
Life is, at times, tough...And all we need to do is to prove that we are tougher than it...
Life is tough, but it's tougher if you're stupid.
The key to life when it gets tough is to keep moving. Just keep moving.
When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.
Life is tough - and you have to be tougher than life to change the world.
A tough life can be defeated only by the tougher person!
When the going gets tough, the tough reinvent.
When the going gets tough, the tough go drinking.
A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
When you think life is tough, it can get a lot tougher
When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
Life is a matter of really tough choices.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Life's a tough proposition, and the first hundred years are the hardest.
Life is tough, but so are you.
When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
Life is very tough. If you don't laugh, it's tough.
Thoughts make life tough.
